tool_description: Calculates comprehensive engagement metrics including likes, shares, comments, reach, and custom engagement rates for social media content.

content_data.description: Array of content identifiers to analyze

metric_types.description: Types of engagement metrics to calculate

normalization_method.description: Method for normalizing metrics (per_follower, per_reach, absolute)

error_messages: No content data provided: At least one content item is required for analysis
Invalid metric types: Specified metrics are not supported for this platform
Missing engagement data: Content lacks sufficient interaction data for analysis
Invalid normalization method: Must be one of [per_follower, per_reach, absolute]
usage: Provide content_data array and metric_types to calculate. Optionally specify normalization_method for comparative analysis across different content sizes.

metric_summaries.description: Summary statistics for each calculated metric
